caption.p: ( a–d) 250-hPa wave geopotential height (Z * 250 hPa) anomalies, and ( e–h) zonal variations of Z * 250 hPa in Aleutian low region for ( a,e) weak, ( b,f) moderate, ( c,g) strong, and ( d,h) very strong IPWP Niño (NDJ mean), based on WACCM4 simulations (R1–5). Stippling indicates anomalies that are significant at the 95% confidence level (Student’s t-test).
